text: Sorry to hear that :disappointed: I think its often like this though! Are they worried its not a viable career ?

I suppose, sometimes they seem prpud with what I do and create but often they really want to steer me away from my passion to something they believe is more secure. I have had a couple heated chats and at the moment seemed to have their support so thats a nice change. I think I'm quite lucky actually they aren't as strict as some asian parents can be.
